Content.En: Have you been there recently? The one on the upper right corner of the school.
Content.Cn: 你最近有去过吗，学校右上角那个。

Content.En: Um... yes, a place called an abandoned toilet.
Content.Cn: 嗯……对，被叫做废弃厕所的地方。

Content.En: I suspect there's something unclean in there, I've come across strange fog several times!
Content.Cn: 我怀疑那里有些不干净的东西，我好几次撞见诡异雾气！
伴随着一些声音，窸窸窣窣的。

Content.En: Don't worry about it, just go and find out what the reason is...
Content.Cn: 别管这个了，总之你去看看是什么原因吧……
